apps.name: AltStore (Beta)
apps.subtitle: An alternative App Store for iOS.
apps.versionDescription: This beta allows sideloaded apps to use just-in-time (JIT) compilation on iOS 14.2 and later (thanks @osy86!).
apps.localizedDescription:
AltStore is an alternative app store for non-jailbroken devices. 

This beta release of AltStore adds support for 3rd party sources, allowing you to download apps from other developers directly through AltStore.

permissions.usageDescription: AltStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows AltStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

apps.name: Delta (Beta)
apps.subtitle: Classic games in your pocket.
apps.versionDescription:
BUG FIXES
• Fixes garbled audio during emulation
• Fixes MelonDS core crashing on devices that don't support JIT
• Fixes audio not playing over AirPlay • Fixes crash when activating Siri

Previous update:

NEW FEATURES
• [MelonDS] DSi emulation (requires additional DSi BIOS files)
• [MelonDS] Just-in-time (JIT) compilation on A12 devices running iOS 14.2 or newer.
• [MelonDS] Microphone support — use your device's microphone to emulate the DS microphone.
• [MelonDS] Emulate closing/opening lid — sleep device to "close" DS lid, wake to "open".

IMPROVEMENTS
• Dark mode support throughout app (thanks @ericlewis!)
apps.localizedDescription:
The next console for Delta is coming: this beta version of Delta brings support for playing DS games!

Please report any issues you find to support@altstore.io. Thanks!

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Delta to use images from your Photo Library as game artwork.

apps.name: Clip (Beta)
apps.subtitle: Manage your clipboard history with ease.
apps.versionDescription:
This update adds a Custom Keyboard app extension for quick access to clippings when editing text.

To enable the keyboard, go to Settings > General > Keyboard > Keyboards > Add New Keyboard... and add "ClipBoard". Once added, make sure to then enable "Allow Full Access" for ClipBoard so it can access your clippings.
apps.localizedDescription:
Clip is a simple clipboard manager for iOS. 

Unlike other clipboard managers, Clip can continue monitoring your clipboard while in the background. No longer do you need to remember to manually open or share to an app to save your clipboard; just copy and paste as you would normally do, and Clip will have your back.

In addition to background monitoring, Clip also has these features:

• Save text, URLs, and images copied to the clipboard.
• Copy, delete, or share any clippings saved to Clip.
• Customizable history limit.

Download Clip today, and never worry about losing your clipboard again!

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Clip to continuously monitor your clipboard in the background.

news.title: Delta Gaining DS Support
news.caption: Available this Saturday for patrons, coming soon for everyone else.

news.title: Welcome to AltStore
news.caption: Please read the FAQ for help with installing apps.

news.title: Sideloading is Here!
news.caption: Update to AltStore 1.3 to install any app directly from Files.

news.title: iOS 13.4 Fixes App Crashes
news.caption: Update to iOS 13.4 to fix some sideloaded apps crashing on launch.
